channel.title: Comments on: Censored and Welcomed
channel.description: BDSM, books and missing links by Xiao Yingtai

item.title: By: abezure
item.dc:creator: abezure
item.description: Sad case that people "hate" others due to thier lifestyle. It goes every where no matter what lifestyle anyone choses, some one always hates it. We just have to hold our heads up and progress forward.
item.content:encoded: Sad case that people “hate” others due to thier lifestyle. It goes every where no matter what lifestyle anyone choses, some one always hates it. We just have to hold our heads up and progress forward.

item.title: By: Yingtai
item.dc:creator: Yingtai
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/censored-and-welcomed/#comment-89">abezure</a>.
Thank you for the encouragement! Still, I have to sympathise with anyone who read <a href="/abject-submission-2a-dark-erotica-fail/" rel="nofollow ugc">my previous post</a> unprepared. It's frightening stuff even for us kinksters.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to abezure.

Thank you for the encouragement! Still, I have to sympathise with anyone who read my previous post unprepared. It’s frightening stuff even for us kinksters.
